creator: Creative innovations
descriptionHtml:
Always on Display Amoled app that is basically design to displays basic information like Mobile Time, Date, Notification, Calendar, Custom Text, Custom Images from your Gallery, Messages notifications, Social Media Notifications, Battery Level and much more...

It will display the Amoled Clock on your mobile screens with the Digital clock AMOLED Display, Analog clock AMOLED Display, Calendar clock, Emoji clock, Picture Display clock, Funny clock, with notifications, and Time at your screen without having to touch the phone.

Always on Display - AMOLED Clock Most Highlighted features:

* Enable/Disable showing notifications
* Always on Display
* Calendar
* Custom Text Option
* Amoled Edge Clock
* Simple and Easy to use UI
* Option to add Custom Images
* Less Battery Consumption
* Multiple Digital and Analog Clocks
* Display Battery Levels
* Notifications
* Social Media Notifications
* Music Controls
* Emoji AMOLED Clock
* Awesome AMOLED Digital Clocks
* Cool designs and awesome performance
* Option to change Fonts size and Colors
* Option to display on Lock Screen
* Variety of AMOLED Clock styles always on display
* HD Backgrounds & Wallpaper
* Can be used as a night clock
* Easy to use Always on Amoled
* Always on' screen on (double tap will turn the screen on)

It has all the required features you are looking for, Enjoy AMOLED Clocks and Multiple Live wallpapers on your screen. Share AMOLED Always On Display Clock Amoled application with your Friends and Family Members.
It has easy to use UI and updated with all new clocks and features. You can suggest us more feature so we will add them in next update.
Enjoy Amoled LITE Edge Clock and share it with your loved ones.
descriptionShort: Always on Amoled : Always on Display Digital Clock

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New and Improved Amoled Clocks
Digital and Analog Clocks
Calendar, Emoji Clocks, Custom text Option, Custom Images Option
Amoled Edge Clock

title: Always on Display Digital Clock : Always on Amoled

creator: Creative innovations
descriptionHtml:
Always on Display Amoled app that is basically design to displays basic information like Mobile Time, Date Notification Calendar Custom Text Custom Images from your Gallery Messages notifications Social Media Notifications Battery Level and much more...
Always on Display is a super Always On Amoled app It will display the Clock on your mobile screens with the Digital clock SUPER AMOLED it has Analog clock Display. Calendar clock. Emoji clock. Picture Display clock with notifications and Time at your screen without having to touch the phone.

Always on Display - AMOLED Most Highlighted features:
* Always On AMOLED Screen provides information about time and date.
* Enable/Disable showing notifications in App (Always on Screen)
* Always on Display
* Calendar
* Custom Text Option
* Edge Clock
* Simple and Easy to use UI
* Option to add Custom Images
* Less Battery Consumption
* Multiple Digital and Analog Clocks
* Display Battery Levels
* Notifications
* Social Media Notifications
* Emoji Clock
* Awesome Digital Clocks Display
* Cool designs and awesome performance
* Option to change clock Colors
* Variety of Clock styles always on display
* Can be used as a night clock
* Easy to use Always on Amoled
* Always on' screen on (double tap will turn the screen on)

Emoji Clock
You Can also display your favorite best emoji on Always on display Screen.


Picture/Photo Clock
Now you can display your own picture or your favorite photo on your Amoled Screen.


It has all the required features you are looking for Enjoy Clocks and Multiple Live wallpapers on your screen. Share Always On Display - SUPER AMOLED.
application with your Friends and Family Members.
Always On AMOLED has easy to use UI and updated with all new clocks and features. You can suggest us more feature so we will add them in next update.
Enjoy Always on Display is a super Always On Amoled and share it with your loved ones.

❖Permissions Used❖

Phone permission
The app needs phone permission to recognize incoming calls, dismiss the app and show incoming calls.

Overlay Permission.
This app needs overlay permission(Draw over other apps) to show Clocks on Screen and work properly .

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
We need this permission to display the picture & sticker on as display screen.
